text: (Aey Muhammad)! Insey pucho, sehra aur samandar ki tareekiyon (darkness) mein kaun tumhein khatraat se bachata hai? Kaun hai jissey tum (museebat ke waqt) gidhgida, gidhgida kar aur chupke chupke duaein maangte ho? Kissey kehte ho ke agar is balaa se tu nay humko bacha liya to hum zaroor shukar-guazar honge
